glsa.title: libaacplus: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libaacplus, the worst of which could result in denial of service.

background.p: libaacplus is an HE-AAC+ v2 library, based on the reference implementation.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libaacplus. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo has discontinued suport for libaacplus. We recommend that users remove it:
